title: DragonTimer Pro iOS iPhone iPad app whit api

comments.author: Ice of Dragons.1637
comments.body: last finishing touches. maybe we will upgrade the timer function itself in this or the next update. Plus i would like to apologise for the delayed update i had a lot of collage stuff to do. Including but not limited to algorithms.

comments.author: Ice of Dragons.1637
comments.body: Daily update : the app should be shipped to apple this weekend. If you want to support us please get the pro version of the app and check out our webpage and other apps. wildworlddev.com thank you all for support.

comments.author: Ice of Dragons.1637
comments.body: Thank you all for using dragon timer and dragon timer pro. Especial a big thank you for all you users that help us improve and the one that make us aware of bugs and mistakes.

comments.author: Ice of Dragons.1637
comments.body: Done doing the pro app in rough. Only some minor bugs and advanced treating needs to be finished then we are good to go and ship this app.

comments.author: Ice of Dragons.1637
comments.body: Doing some images for the API part.

comments.author: Ice of Dragons.1637
comments.body: We are half way true to posting the new update for DragonTimer Pro whit GW2 native api. Currently we are working on the art for the api functions. The first tests went great and we are looking forward to give you more informations in the upcoming week.
